headline.main: One Dead and 3 Hurt After Off-Duty Officer’s S.U.V. Hits Pedestrians in Brooklyn

snippet: The officer, who was off duty when his vehicle mounted a sidewalk in the Williamsburg section early on Saturday, was charged with manslaughter, assault and driving while intoxicated....
lead_paragraph: The officer, who was off duty when his vehicle mounted a sidewalk in the Williamsburg section early on Saturday, was charged with manslaughter, assault and driving while intoxicated.
